attributes.action: Confirm the launch date of new post study work permit for International students
attributes.additional_details: Lot of int.students enrolled with a hope of getting the new visa extension are facing immense pressure due to government not being in line to confirm the launch date. It only mentions as to launch in summer 2021. This has created confusion and unstablility among international students in hopes of settling down with thier career in the UK. In countries like India, education consultants have managed to sell the idea of new PSW to all their clients with no proper confirmation on the launch date.
attributes.background: The new rules recieved in regards to the extension of post study work permit has no clear launch date. We need the government/ parlimemt to confirm the date from when can eligible international students in the UK can apply for PSW visa extension.
